requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6600 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2500X
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-10105f /AMD RYZEN 3 3200G
  • Memory: 800 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ R9 390X (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

results.name: What If We Made a Game but We Took Turns Making It and Did Not Communicate
